project_detail_from_customer: I want to create a small vlog in Dubai, I need exactly two Camera Operators and one director
detailed_desc: The project involves creating a small vlog in Dubai. The primary location for this project will be various iconic spots around Dubai, such as the Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, and Palm Jumeirah. The tasks at each location will include capturing high-quality video footage, directing the scenes, and ensuring that the vlog content is engaging and visually appealing. The team required for this project will consist of two Camera Operators and one Director. The same team will travel to the different locations within Dubai to maintain consistency in the vlog's production quality and style.

crew_requirements.responsibilty_in_project: Oversee the creative aspects of the vlog, direct scenes, and ensure the content is engaging and visually appealing.
Capture high-quality video footage at various iconic spots around Dubai.
Capture high-quality video footage at various iconic spots around Dubai.
Capture high-quality video footage at various iconic spots around Dubai.

queries.query: SELECT * FROM crew WHERE roleJobTitle = 'Director' AND location = 'Dubai';
SELECT * FROM crew WHERE roleJobTitle = 'Camera Operator' AND location = 'Burj Khalifa';
SELECT * FROM crew WHERE roleJobTitle = 'Camera Operator' AND location = 'Dubai Mall';
SELECT * FROM crew WHERE roleJobTitle = 'Camera Operator' AND location = 'Palm Jumeirah';

Director.preferred_because: Emily Roberts has extensive experience in visual storytelling and scene setup, which are crucial for capturing high-quality and engaging vlog content. Her expertise aligns well with the project's requirements of directing scenes at iconic spots around Dubai.

Camera Operator.preferred_because: Rashid Al-Habsi has 8 years of experience and specializes in Camera Operation and Focus Pulling, which are crucial for capturing high-quality video footage and ensuring engaging content. His expertise in technical skills and focus control will be beneficial for directing scenes and maintaining visual appeal.

Omar Al-Mahmoud has expertise in Camera Operation and Frame Composition, which are crucial for capturing high-quality and visually appealing vlog content. His experience and skills align well with the project's requirements, and his rate is within the budget.
